Platform SDK Java 9.0 API Reference

Uses of Package
com.genesyslab.platform.standby

  • Packages that use com.genesyslab.platform.standby 
    Package Description
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.application
    This package provides helper components for connectivity with Genesys Configuration Framework.
    com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration
    Provides helper classes that read application options and other data from Configuration Server, converts it to corresponding Platform SDK objects and makes it easier to set up connections to backend servers and other applications.
    com.genesyslab.platform.clusterprotocol
    Cluster Protocol Application Block
    com.genesyslab.platform.clusterprotocol.lb
    Load Balancer for Cluster Protocol.
    com.genesyslab.platform.standby  
    com.genesyslab.platform.standby.events  
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.application 
    Class Description
    WarmStandby
    WarmStandby is used for opening/restoring a channel connection to any endpoint from the pool.
    WSConfig
    The warm standby configuration helps to define endpoint pool and other delays and timeout properties
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.apptemplate.configuration 
    Class Description
    WSConfig
    The warm standby configuration helps to define endpoint pool and other delays and timeout properties
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.clusterprotocol 
    Class Description
    IWSHandler
    The handler provides possibility to handle warmstandby activity events and make some changes in the configuration and/or stop/restart the warmstandby to affect the default wamstandby behaviour.
    WSConfig
    The warm standby configuration helps to define endpoint pool and other delays and timeout properties
    WSHandler
    The handler template provides possibility to handle warmstandby activity events and make some changes in the configuration and/or stop/restart the warmstandby to affect the default warmstandby behaviour.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.clusterprotocol.lb 
    Class Description
    WSConfig
    The warm standby configuration helps to define endpoint pool and other delays and timeout properties
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.standby 
    Class Description
    IWSHandler
    The handler provides possibility to handle warmstandby activity events and make some changes in the configuration and/or stop/restart the warmstandby to affect the default wamstandby behaviour.
    WSConfig
    The warm standby configuration helps to define endpoint pool and other delays and timeout properties
    WSHandler
    The handler template provides possibility to handle warmstandby activity events and make some changes in the configuration and/or stop/restart the warmstandby to affect the default warmstandby behaviour.
  • Classes in com.genesyslab.platform.standby used by com.genesyslab.platform.standby.events 
    Class Description
    WarmStandby
    WarmStandby is used for opening/restoring a channel connection to any endpoint from the pool.
